Class Experience

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.Loot
      • com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.loot.Experience
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, org.bukkit.configuration.serialization.ConfigurationSerializable

    public class Experience
extends Loot
    An Experience is a range of experience to be given to the looter
    Author:
    Codisimus
